animeTitle: Detective Conan Movie 13 - The Raven Chaser
otherNames: Meitantei Conan: Shikkoku no Chaser, Detective Conan Movie 13, 名探偵コナン漆黒の追跡者(チェイサー)
synopsis:
Kudou Shinichi is living his life as Edogawa Conan, but those days might end pretty soon. The Black Syndicate is coming dangerously close to learning the truth about Shinichi having survived.
Conan and everybody around him may end up dead if he does not manage to find Irish — a member of the Black Organisation who has infiltrated the police forces, currently investigating a big serial murder case.
